title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy for a binary project (e.g. 'org.apache.ant'), the following message is displayed: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, what does the message mean?
SR:
1. Open the binary project 'org.apache.ant'.
2. Try to view the scoped type hierarchy.
3. Observe the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
